data.name: G Golem Stubborn Menhir
data.desc:
2 EARTH monsters
If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 EARTH monster in your GY that can be Normal Summoned/Set; add it to your hand or Special Summon it, but if you Special Summon it, negate its effects, also banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "G Golem Stubborn Menhir" once per turn.
